strings.string: %1 is currently unavailable in the Opera TV Store.
strings.comment: Error message explaining that application is not abailable in TVStore. %1 should not be translated
Text on a video description page, shows how long is given video
Button on an app/video description page, it adds given resource to favorites
Text on an app/video description page, it specifies genre of given resource
Button on an app/video description page, it show more videos/apps of given publisher. %1 should not be translated
Text shown over video thumnbnail explaining that given video is currently being played
Publication date of a video
Text on an video/movie description page, it specifies whom starring in given movie
Button text to accept EULA displayed to the user
Button text to reject EULA and quit from our application (accepting EULA is mandatory).

strings.string: Press OK/Enter to try again, or BACK to exit.
strings.comment: Error box text OK/Enter/BACK refeer to buttons on remote.
Generic Error message caption
Generic warning message text. OK/Enter refeer to a buttons on remote.
Generic warning message caption
Button of a virtual keyboard, DELETE on a normal keyboard
Button of a virtual keyboard, SPACE on a normal keyboard
Button that will remove all history entries on Last Searches section
Text displayed when there was an error during searching
Text displayed during waiting for search results being returned from server
Caption of a section where there is list of a last searches queries.
Text displayed when there was no results for given search term
Caption of a section where there is list of a popular searches queries.
Section caption of applications search results for string given by user (%1). %1 should not be translated
Section caption of clips search results for string given by user (%1). %1 should not be translated
Section caption of movies search results for string given by user (%1). %1 should not be translated
Caption of a Search section, were user can search for videos/apps/movies
Caption of a section inside settings where user can read about our application
Caption of a section where user can turn on autoplay feaure on/off (automatically play next video on list)
Button to switch autoplay functionality on/off
Caption of a section where user can change our application language
Generic OFF button for disabling features like autoplay
Generic ON button for enabling features like autoplay
Section explaining privacy inside TVStore (our application)
Caption of a section where user(developer) can change some develop-specific options withit our application
Caption of a section where user can check and change status of a Payments account attached to his TVStore account
Caption of a section where user can enable or disable suffle feature (randomize order of videos being autoplayed on list)
Button to switch shuffle functionality on/off
Section name describing Terms of Service
Caption of a section where user can check weather and change default displayed unit from Celcius to Fahrenheit
Button text that switching between Fahrenheit and Celcius

strings.string: Automatically play next video from current playlist
strings.comment: Description of an autoplay feature

strings.string:
User %1 wants to connect to this device.
Do you want to grant access?
strings.comment: Developer message about connecting developer account with tvstore account
Developer message about successfully connecting developer account with tvstore account

strings.string:
To pair this device with your submission portal account, you need an ID for developers.
You can generate it here. It will be valid for 15 minutes. Keep this screen open while pairing.
strings.comment: Developer explanation of how to connect developer account with tvstore account
Simple timeout message %1 should not be translated
Simple fail message (only for developers)
Button for developers that will generate ID to fill in on a desktop machine

strings.string:
Your ID for developers is here.
It will be valid for %1 minutes. Keep this screen open while pairing.
strings.comment: Information for the developer that tries to bind their TV with developer account on computer
Button that will trigger flow of connecting payments account with our TVStore account
Caption of a section where user can change language of our application
Desription of a SelectLanguage section, where user can change language of our application

strings.string: You have not yet selected a method of payment. Choose one, and log in.
strings.comment: Default message displayed on a Payments section when user haven't add any Payment Account

strings.string: You can randomly shuffle videos from a playlist
strings.comment: Desription of a shuffle option, turning it on will make playing of vides in random order
Welcome message shown at application start
Celcius temperature unit format (probably don't need translation)
Fahrenheit temperature unit format (probably don't need translation)
Section on mainscreen where user can change some settings
Section inside favorite area where we display list of user favorited applications
Section inside favorite area where we display list of user favorited clips
Section inside favorite area where we display list of user favorited movies
